SEARCH

Class TurnSubmission

java.lang.Object
TurnSubmission
public class TurnSubmission extends Object
A class that encapsulates the player's choices during their turn in the game. It includes the selected action, either a new tactic, relic, or gambit to swap, and a battle modifier to discard.
